name: Woodland Walk
description: If you like trees, this is the trail for you! Get lost for hours in the tall trees listening to the sound of the birds. Just watch out for the squirrels!!

name: Alpine Hike
description: Do you like snow and thin air? Then you're going to love this exhilarating walk up a mountain. Make sure you bring lots of chocolate - you'll need the energy.
